backend/main.mo: Canister backend managing user profiles, transactions, and contacts with access control and storage for balances and history.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, routing, theming, and page rendering.
Authentication button component supporting Internet Identity login/logout with loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/PrincipalDi: Displays the user's principal with copy‑to‑clipboard functionality and truncation.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for first‑time users to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/components/contacts/Contact: Modal form for adding or editing a contact with validation and save/update mutations.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header, auth controls, and navigation tabs based on the current page.
frontend/src/components/layout/WalletLog: Renders the app logo and name with styled visual effects.
frontend/src/components/wallet/Recipient: Popover UI for selecting a contact as a transaction recipient from a searchable list.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the authenticated identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, balances, transactions, and contacts through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom light and dark theme variables, glow effects, and global background styling.
frontend/src/lib/branding.ts: Exports app and token name constants.
frontend/src/lib/icpAccountId.ts: Implements ICP account ID derivation from a Principal using SHA‑224 and CRC32.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility helpers for class merging, principal truncation, and timestamp formatting.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Validation helpers for recipients and amounts plus balance formatting and amount parsing.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, query client, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ContactsPage.tsx: Displays and manages the contact list with CRUD UI, dialogs, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows ICP and Infinity Coin balances with refresh behavior and loading handling.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays locally stored transaction history with filtering, refresh, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/ReceivePage.tsx: Displays the user’s ICP Account ID derived from their principal and provides copy-to-clipboard functionality with alerts and guidance for receiving ICP.
frontend/src/pages/SendPage.tsx: Implements a multi‑step flow for sending ICP or Infinity Coin, including validation, confirmation, and recording transactions with success feedback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind theme extensions, colors, fonts, shadows, and plugins to support the app’s custom UI styling.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, existing features, and architectural notes describing the Infinity Wallet build state.
